original_text: He has promised to be kind to our ancestors. He will do the things that he promised in his holy covenant. He has promised to be kind to our ancestors.
korean_text: 우리 조상을 긍휼히 여기시며 그 거룩한 언약을 기억하셨으니

sentences.original_text: He has promised to be kind to our ancestors.
that he promised in his holy covenant.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 거룩한 언약에서 약속한 것들을

sentences.original_text: He has promised to be kind to our ancestors.
